definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Fear keeps us from surrendering, but love casts out all fear.
sentences.chinese: 恐惧阻碍我们降服，但爱能除去一切恐惧。

sentences.english: A second barrier to total surrender is our pride.
sentences.chinese: 骄傲是阻碍我们完全降服的第二个因素。

sentences.english: Only then, can the group soar high and overcome any difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 只有如许，一个组合才能降服重重坚苦，展翅高飞。

sentences.english: He has also been portrayed as a power hungry conqueror.
sentences.chinese: 他也被描绘成一个电力饿地降服者。

sentences.english: Everybody eventually surrenders to something or someone.
sentences.chinese: 每个人最终都要降服于某人或某事。

sentences.english: Humans then had no need to show superiority by requesting submission from animals.
sentences.chinese: 这样人类就不必要求动物降服来显示自己的优越性。

sentences.english: The goddess vanquished Red Boy and brought him to the South Sea.
sentences.chinese: 菩萨降服了红孩儿，把他带回南海。

sentences.english: We are confident that we can overcome the difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 我们相疑可以或许大概降服坚苦。

sentences.english: Fath actually means surrender and commitment to the claims of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 信仰的意思其实就是向基督的声明降服与委身。
你降服于神的计划之下。

sentences.english: Regardless, surrendering is never just a one-time event.
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，降服不只是一次即成的事情。

sentences.english: Each of these people were fully surrendered to God.
sentences.chinese: 这些人物每一位都完全降服于神。

sentences.english: Another aspect of a fully surrendered life is trust.
sentences.chinese: 降服的另外一个表现是信靠。

sentences.english: Another form of game-playing is victim.
sentences.chinese: 另外一种意义上的感情游戏就是降服。

sentences.english: Removing the blocks is to control and turn poisons into supreme bodhi.
sentences.chinese: 除障，乃降服一切烦恼，转无明烦恼为无上菩提。

sentences.english: The Bible is crystal clear about how you benefit when you fully surrender your life to God.
sentences.chinese: 圣经清楚说明当你完全降服于神会有什么好处。

definition: to subdue/to force to capitulate/to reduce to submission/to soothe
to compel sb to obey/to force into submission/to subjugate
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to overawe/to be scared into submission
to acknowledge allegiance to (some regime)/to serve
to be defeated on the battlefield/to be beaten in a contest
to overpower/to overwhelm/to subdue/to check/to control
